Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

Class GameMainSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.FXMLController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.GameMainSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameMainSceneController extends FXMLController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
GameMainSceneController controls the main scene (gameMainScene.fxml) of the game in the gui
See Also:
  • FXMLController
  • Initializable

    DragAndDropManager handles all drag and drop events for the movement of students and mother nature

    • checkAssistants

      private void checkAssistants()
      Checks if players have already played an assistant when the scene is loaded and, if so, updates the images in the school boxes. This can happen when a restored game that was already started is restarted

    • checkCoinsOnCharacters

      private void checkCoinsOnCharacters(int characterId, CharacterImage characterImage, ExpertFieldView expertField)
      Check if the character in the restored game had already a coin on it when the game restarts
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the coin
      characterImage - the character image on the gui
      expertField - the expert field of the client's model view

    • onTurn

      public void onTurn(List<String> actionCommands, List<String> possibleActions)
      Notifies the user that it is his turn in the round
      Parameters:
      actionCommands - the actions that the user can do in the turn
      possibleActions - the actions that the user can do now (and not only in the turn)

      Parameters:
      lastTower - the last tower present on the island
      newTower - the new tower of the island
      islandId - th id of the island

      public void onEndGameEvent(PropertyChangeEvent evt)

      Parameters:
